Pests & Diseases and Biological Control

Pests & Diseases are present in most farms worldwide, but with simple measures and practices one can reduce them significantly.

See here an excellent animated video on how to detect pests & diseases and also different options to control pests & diseases without using pesticides.




See here a real-life farm video on how a real farmer protects his crop from pests & diseases using various organic possibilities:
